channel.title: Programming in R on Columbia Psychology Scientific Computing
channel.description: Recent content in Programming in R on Columbia Psychology Scientific Computing

item.title: Programming, Part 0
item.description: code.sourceCode span { display: inline-block; line-height: 1.25; } code.sourceCode span { color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit; } code.sourceCode span:empty { height: 1.2em; } .sourceCode { overflow: visible; } code.sourceCode { white-space: pre; position: relative; } div.sourceCode { margin: 1em 0; } pre.sourceCode { margin: 0; } @media screen { div.sourceCode { overflow: auto; } } @media print { code.sourceCode { white-space: pre-wrap; } code.sourceCode span { text-indent: -5em; padding-left: 5em; } } pre.
